import { useState, useContext } from "react" import { GlobalContext } from "../../../GlobalProvider" const Days = ({selectedDays, setSelectedDays}) => { const handleSelectProspect = (e) => { const prospectId = e.target.value if(!selectedDays.includes(prospectId)){ setSelectedDays([...selectedDays, prospectId]) } else{ setSelectedDays(selectedDays.filter((selectedProspectsId) => { return selectedProspectsId !== prospectId; }) ) } } return(
) } export default Days
